sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REZAN or Rezanskoi, an ancient town of Ruf-ſia, and capſtal of a duchy of the ſame name, with an archbiſhop’s ſee. If was formetly conſiderable ſor its extent and riches; but it was almoſt ruined by the Tartars in 1568. The conntry is populous, and was for-merly governed by its own princes. E. Long. 42. 37. N. Lat. 54. 54.
